name: Slaves of Giza
description:
You control a group of 50 ancient egyptian slaves, tasked with transporting stone form a quarry to the site where the magnificent Pyramid of Giza (soon to be one of the wonders of the world) will be built. The schedule is tight and there are many hazards along the way. Will you be able to complete your task?

This game was created in 48 hours for the Last Minute Jam 2016.
